DM_Title.infoName: Description of how it is made

Restriction_Instructions.Data_Distribution: To be made available to all S1000D users.

Export_Control.exportRegistrationStmt: Export of this data module to all countries that are the residence of organizations that are users of S1000D is permitted. Storage of this data module is to be at the discretion of the organization.

Restriction_Instructions.Data_Handling: There are no specific handling instructions for this data module.
Restriction_Instructions.Data_Destruction: Users may destroy this data module in accordance with their own local procedures.
Restriction_Instructions.Data_Disclosure: There are no dissemination limitations that apply to this data module.

Levelled_Para.Title: Steering
Levelled_Para.Para: The steering on the bike is what enables the bike to manoeuvre in a given direction during travel. The steering system on the bike is made of three parts, they are:

Levelled_Para.Title: Handlebars
Levelled_Para.Para: The handlebars are what the rider uses to control the direction of the bike. They are typically made of aluminum or steel, and come in a variety of shapes and sizes.

Levelled_Para.Title: Stem
Levelled_Para.Para: The stem connects the handlebars to the fork. It is typically made of aluminum or steel, and comes in a variety of lengths and angles.

Levelled_Para.Title: Fork
Levelled_Para.Para: The fork connects the front wheel to the frame. It is typically made of aluminum or steel, and comes in a variety of shapes and sizes.
